attributes.action: Not to offer a peerage to the speaker Michael Martin
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the speaker has abused taxpayers money to prevent mps expenses from being published, as well as his own. he has been totally incompetent in dealing with the matter and has resigned. he must not get a peerage for his failure and sit in the house of lords. he should reimburse the taxpayers out of his own pocket.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
